SEARCH
Module jtamaro

Package jtamaro.graphic

package jtamaro.graphic
Compositional graphics in Java.
  • Graphics: operations for working with graphics
  • Colors: pre-defined colors and methods to create custom colors
  • Fonts: pre-defined fonts that can be used to render text
  • Points: pre-defined pin points
See Also:
  • PyTamaro
  • Class
    Description
    Actionable<T>
    An Actionable can be used to add mouse event handlers to specific graphics in an interaction.
    CartesianWorld
    A CartesianWorld can be used to place Graphics at specific positions in a Cartesian coordinate system.
    Color
    Represents a color.
    Colors
    Static methods for working with Colors, and static fields for well-known Colors.
    Fonts
    Static fields for well-known fonts.
    Graphic
    A graphic (image) with a position for pinning.
    Graphics
    Static methods for working with graphics.
    Point
    A Point in a Graphic.
    Points
    Names of notable points, that can be used as pinning positions for a graphic.
